pages.title: Blue Coral Snake
pages.text: Calliophis bivirgatus is a species of snake in the family Elapidae known commonly as the blue coral snake or blue Malayan coral snake.$(br2)It is native to Southeast Asia.

pages.title: Blue Coral Snake
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:rabbit$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
